ComicInfo.Summary:
Jay and Mania’s time-hopping, death-defying, rock’n’rolling adventure comes to its epic conclusion! Will they be able to get the Sword of Immortality back from KISS and return it before Jay is trapped in the Waste Land forever?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stuart Sayger | 1 | B | Cover B | Jorge Fornes | 2 | C | Cover C | Denis Medri | 3 | D | Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Fornes | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Denis Medri | 7 |
